scripts.prepare-deps: npm run build-native && npm run build-page-objects && npm run build-locators && npm link page-objects && npm link native && npm link locators
scripts.build-page-objects: cd page-objects && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-native: cd native && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-locators: cd locators && npm i && npm run build
scripts.prebuild: npm run prepare-deps && cd api-handler && npm install
scripts.build: rimraf out/ && tsc && chmod a+x ./out/cli.js && cd api-handler && npm run build && cp *.vsix ../resources/api-handler.vsix
scripts.prepare-test: cd test/test-project && npm install && rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.test: npm run build && cd test/test-project && npm run ui-test
scripts.ci-test: npm run build && cd test/test-project && npm run ci-test
